name: ALLIANCE FOR MRNA MEDICINES
description: Multi-organization alliance representing the MRNA sector.
sampleDescriptions: The Alliance for mRNA Medicines (AMM) is dedicated to advancing and advocating for mRNA and next-generation encoding RNA therapeutics and vaccines for the benefit of patients, public health, and socie
